channel.title: Hitting npcs
channel.description: I got 2 of the same sources 1 is edited and 1 isnt but the 1 im working of you can hardly hit npcs and the other 1 you can. I tested it out by changing client.java to the un-edited 1 and then i couldnt hit the npcs so i know its in the client but idk where to look tbh =\. Anyone know what controls how often u hit npcs with melee and range? Because its like impossible to hit like monsters 100+ cmb and hard to hit some 100- even if u got like 90+ att.
